name: casacore
description: A suite of c++ libraries for radio astronomy data processing.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: readline
dependencies.description:
The GNU Readline library provides a set of functions for use by
applications that allow users to edit command lines as they are typed
in. Both Emacs and vi editing modes are available. The Readline library
includes additional functions to maintain a list of previously-entered
command lines, to recall and perhaps reedit those lines, and perform
csh-like history expansion on previous commands.

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: cfitsio
dependencies.description:
CFITSIO is a library of C and Fortran subroutines for reading and
writing data files in FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) data
format.

dependencies.name: wcslib
dependencies.description:
WCSLIB a C implementation of the coordinate transformations defined in
the FITS WCS papers.

dependencies.name: fftw
dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.

dependencies.name: sofa-c
dependencies.description: Standards of Fundamental Astronomy (SOFA) library for ANSI C.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: adios2
dependencies.description:
The Adaptable Input Output System version 2, developed in the Exascale
Computing Program

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependent_to.name: dysco
dependent_to.description: Dysco is a compressing storage manager for Casacore mearement sets.

dependent_to.name: aoflagger
dependent_to.description: RFI detector and quality analysis for astronomical radio observations.

dependent_to.name: chgcentre
dependent_to.description:
The chgcentre tool can be used to change the phase centre of a
measurement set.
